content.value:
I've written 8000 words today. "How does she do it?" I hear you ask. "What's her secret?" "Does she have a wife?"

Gather around, little ones. Let me tell you the ways of the author.

Closer.

Come closer. 

Now listen.  

I have deadlines looming and I am fucked.
content.html: I've written 8000 words today. "How does she do it?" I hear you ask. "What's her secret?" "Does she have a wife?" Gather around, little ones. Let me tell you the ways of the author. Closer. Come closer. Now listen. I have deadlines looming and I am fucked.
